    • updateGamePhase

      public void updateGamePhase​(GamePhase gamePhase)
      Description copied from class: ModelUpdateHandler
      Updates the gamePhase. The different states in which the game can be are: GamePhase.SELECTING_LEADERS, GamePhase.PLAYING, GamePhase.END.
      Overrides:
      updateGamePhase in class ModelUpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      gamePhase - The different states in which the game can be are: GamePhase.SELECTING_LEADERS, GamePhase.PLAYING, GamePhase.END

    • updateTurn

      public void updateTurn​(java.lang.String playerName)
      Description copied from class: ModelUpdateHandler
      Updates the turn of the given player. The states of the game are GameState.CONNECTING, GameState.PLAYING, GameState.SELECT_LEADERS, GameState.WAIT_SELECT_LEADERS, GameState.STARTING, GameState.CHOOSING_NAME, GameState.CHOOSING_PLAYERS.
      Overrides:
      updateTurn in class ModelUpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player to update the turn

    • insertDrawnResources

      Description copied from class: ModelUpdateHandler
      Inserts the resources drawn from the market by a given player.
      Overrides:
      insertDrawnResources in class ModelUpdateHandler
      Parameters:
      playerName - the name of the player whose drawn resources need to be stored
      result - a list representing the resources to store
